committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the definition of "rural area" in the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and title V of the Housing Act of 1949 in order to permit towns of thirty thousand or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas for purposes of those acts.

summary.text: Redefines, for purposes of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and the Housing Act of 1949, the term "rural area" to permit towns of 30,000 or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the definition of "rural area" in the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and title V of the Housing Act of 1949 in order to permit towns of thirty thousand or less inhabitants to be considered rural areas for purposes of those acts.
